text: I have the following piece of code that I execute around 2 million times in my application to parse that many records.
This part seems to be the bottleneck and I was wondering if anyone could help me by suggesting some nifty tricks that could make these simple string manipulations faster.

code:
try:
    data = []
    start = 0
    end = 0
    for info in self.Columns():
        end = start + (info.columnLength)
        slice = line[start:end]
        if slice == '' or len(slice) != info.columnLength:
            raise 'Wrong Input'
        if info.hasSignage:
            if(slice[0:1].strip() != '+' and slice[0:1].strip() != '-'):
                raise 'Wrong Input'
        if not info.skipColumn:
            data.append(slice)
        start = end 
    parsedLine = data
except:
    parsedLine = False
